body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/
-->


**What happened**:

When developing unit tests related to PDBs/Deletion,https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/registry/generic/registry/store.go#L932 mutates pod resource via adding deletion timestamp, and this directly conflicts with checking resource version.

**What you expected to happen**:

No resource version mutation.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

I'm attempting to add preconditions to delete call in eviction API:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83906/files#diff-9644c646d1076728c605baed12a5813aR138



**Anything else we need to know?**:
Happens locally and in CI.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): Head of master: c97baa339b5043424522dc7932fc3891f15543cb
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g: `cat /etc/os-release`):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Network plugin and version (if this is a network-related bug):
- Others:

title: Graceful deletion mutates object invalidating ResourceVersion in deletion precondition
